title: Help
body:
Today I tried to play with some friends and after champion select league wouldn't start.
Tried it later in a custom game and the result was the same.

replies.body: Did you see any specific error messages or behavior when this happened? With a bit more context, I'll be able to provide the right steps to take in order to resolve this.

Game simply doesn't start, even if i keep pressing the reconnect button.
No error, nothing, simply game won't start after champ select.

Got it. So when the game won't even start loading up, it's generally a sign that the client cannot establish a stable connection to the game server. This can be caused by an overbearing Firewall, a spotty WiFi connection, or other local network settings. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) serves as a comprehensive guide that goes over the most common solutions and is a great place to start. 

Let me know if you notice any changes after completing the steps in that guide.
